TopicTitle: Help me find the mod please

Articles.Content:
Hi all.

about 4-6 months ago I installed a mod that had really big inline frame sections (yellow/orange) that had attachment nodes.

for instance you could have 3.75 diameter rocket and inline you'd put this frame and then attach decouplers within the side to add stuff you want to haul into space and because it was a inline frame the drag footprint was minimal because your parts were within the 3.75 diameter.

there were also parts in my pack that were like sml/m/large 'oblong' containers(such as what shipyards of today hold in their docks)

and lastly within a mod pack there was a command pod that was sortof like a hammerhead. it was HUGE and orange.. looked almost like the front of one of those rebel alliance ships (I think they were cruisers) in starwars ep 4/5/6

 

I hope someone can direct me to the mods I have been looking for.

Thanks alot
You're thinking of @RoverDude's Freight Transportation Technologies.

holy moly your right!

I looked there too and saw the vtol and thought naa that's not it.. but i just noticed the second imgur link, I had a look and hey presto! thanks m8'y your a gem!

3 minutes ago, C04L said:

holy moly your right!

I looked there too and saw the vtol and thought naa that's not it.. but i just noticed the second imgur link, I had a look and hey presto! thanks m8'y your a gem!

I actually got confused looking for it, since the imgur albums gave a javascript error and didn't load. It wasn't until I clicked on them to view them on imgur that I saw it was the mod I was thinking of.
